$documentation.purpose: Central registry for client-sourced facts (quotes, metrics, observations, constraints). Raw data extracted from interviews, documents, and stakeholder communications.
$documentation.phase_position: First layer - raw input from client materials

key_attributes.facts[].id: Unique fact identifier following CF-{TYPE}-{NNN} pattern
key_attributes.facts[].content: The actual quote, metric, or observation text
key_attributes.facts[].stakeholder: Role or name of the source person
key_attributes.facts[].referenced_by: Array of downstream IDs that cite this fact

validation_rules: Every fact MUST have a source reference
Quotes MUST be verbatim with stakeholder attribution
Metrics MUST include units and context

description: Registry of Client Facts with traceability to source materials
